General.Name: Alternus Energy Group PLC
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Alternus Energy Group Plc operates as an international vertically integrated independent power producer. It owns, develops, installs, and operates midsized utility scale solar parks. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Dublin, Ireland.
General.Address: Blanchardstown Corporate Park 2, Dublin, Ireland, D15 R504
